text: Emma (estimate 975-1062) was Sovereign Count and Margrave of Provence from 1037 until 1062. She was the daughter of Rotbold II of Provence and Ermengarde of Burgundy. She inherited the title from her elder brother William III, and married William III of Toulouse. With William, she had two children: *Pons, who succeeded to Toulouse *Bertrand, who succeeded Pons in Toulouse (1060) and his mother in Provence ==Sources== *Medieval Lands Project: Provence. *Lewis, Archibald R. The Development of Southern French and Catalan Society, 718-1050\. University of Texas Press: Austin, 1965. title: Emma of Provence
